summary: 1 MEDIUM security concern, 1 LOW validation gap

issues.title: Potential information disclosure in quality warnings
issues.why: Warnings include conversation IDs (first 20 chars) and full issue signatures displayed in UI. Could expose sensitive conversation identifiers and internal product details to unauthorized users or competitors.
issues.fix: Remove identifiers from user-facing warnings. Log full details server-side, return sanitized summaries: 'Theme filtered: {reason} (score={score})' without conversation_id or full signature.
issues.verify: Confirm if pipeline page is publicly accessible and if conversation IDs are considered sensitive.

issues.title: Missing input validation on threshold parameter
issues.why: check_theme_quality accepts threshold float without range validation. If ever exposed as user parameter, negative or >1.0 values could bypass/break quality gates.
issues.fix: Add validation: if not (0.0 <= threshold <= 1.0): raise ValueError(...)
